venue.address_1: to be sent to all who sign up
venue.name: My house

item.description:
Everyone bring a dish to share for dinner, and game you would be interested in playing as a group.

trying this out, if i dont get a good number of people to sign up will cancel it.. Just January usually brings on some depression..

With the economy we could all use a break from spending money on going out. Just enjoy a night with old and new friends to spend time with..

time will be determined with suggestions. BYOB if you will have cocktails.

Claire

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Pot luck dinner and games
